item.title: Japan trade deal info on Trump's desk was altered by hand with a marker
item.description: Details of the Japan deal shared a photo posted by by Dan Scavino, the White House deputy chief of staff, shows discrepancies and last-minute edits.

item.title: Trump says U.S. struck trade, military deal with the Philippines; Manila has not confirmed
item.description: President Donald Trump said the U.S. has "concluded" a trade deal with the Philippines that includes a 19% tariff on goods from the Southeast Asian co...

item.title: Trump shifts gears to EU after striking Japan deal
item.description: The U.S.-Japan trade deal sparked hopes that the European Union will also be able to strike an agreement.

item.title: Chinese and EU leaders are about to meet â€” but the U.S. is complicating things
item.description: Chinese and European Union leaders are meeting at a summit in Beijing on Thursday, with trade tensions running high.
